testcase.name: test_platform_settings_get_superadmin
testcase.system-out: GET /api/platform-settings returns partner_access_enabled=true, maintenance_mode=false, is_super_admin=true for Super Admin email

testcase.name: test_platform_settings_put_superadmin
testcase.system-out: PUT /api/platform-settings toggles maintenance_mode successfully for Super Admin

testcase.name: test_platform_settings_put_forbidden
testcase.system-out: PUT /api/platform-settings returns 403 for non-Super Admin user

testcase.name: test_bassi_7_reservations
testcase.system-out: GET /api/reservations returns 7 reservations for Bassi (Super Admin)

testcase.name: test_coach_vitrine_bassi
testcase.system-out: GET /api/coach/vitrine/bassi returns coach profile with name 'Bassi - Afroboost'

testcase.name: test_coach_packs_api
testcase.system-out: GET /api/admin/coach-packs returns 3 packs including free test pack (0 CHF)

testcase.name: test_homepage_4_march_dates
testcase.system-out: Homepage loads with 4 March dates: 04.03, 11.03, 18.03, 25.03 at 18:30

testcase.name: test_partner_dashboard_hash_modal
testcase.system-out: #partner-dashboard hash opens 'Connexion Partenaire' modal with Google login button
